page.title: 07CONTRACT FARMING
page.content: CONTRACT FARMING IS WHEN PEOPLE ASK THE CONTRACTOR TO DO JOBS LIKE PLOUGHING,LIME & MUCK SPREADING SILAGING, CONBINE HARVESTING, SPRAYING FIELDS AND SPREADING FERTILIZER. FOR THESE JOBS MY DAD HAS THE BIGGEST 1250 MASSEY FERGUSON, A 950 MASSEY FERGUSON A COMBINE HARVESTER, A PLOUGH,A MUCK & LIME SPREADER,A SILAGER AND HIS OWN TRAILORS AND A PONY PICKUP. WHEN MY DAD GOES TO HOLKER HALL TO SILAGE HE HAS TO DO MORE THAN A THOUSAND ACRES. THE NORMAL SIZE OF A FIELD MY DAD HAS TO WORK IN IS ABOUT 80-100 ACRES. THE FIRM WHICH MY DAD WORKS FOR IS CALLED JOHN GRAVES & SON .THE MANAGER GOT SOME BIG STICKERS TO STICK ON TO THE FIRM'S VEHICLES SO THE FIRM COULD ADVERTISE . MY DAD WORKS ABOUT 17 HOURS A DAY IN THE SUMMER EXCEPT SUNDAYS AND SATURDAY AFTERNOONS.
